means: 自然地，自发地，不由自主地

sentence.Network_en: Usually a woman's breasts produce milk spontaneously after the birth.
sentence.Network_cn: 女性的乳房通常在产后会自然泌乳。

sentence.Network_en: He was never spontaneously warm or friendly towards us.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从未自然而然地对我们表示过热情或友好。

sentence.Network_en: As soon as the tremor passed, many people spontaneously arose and cheered.
sentence.Network_cn: 震感刚一过去，很多人就自发地站起来欢呼。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第二册) - 豆丁网 ... slim a. 苗条的 spontaneously ad. 自发地 statement n. 讲述的话.
via__六级词汇选择题 - 豆丁网 ... ) simultaneously 同时地； )spontaneously 自然地，自发地； ) transmission 传输、播送、发射；.
四六级词汇短语_百度文库 ... simultaneously ad. 同时发生地 spontaneously ad. 自发地,自然产生地 virtually ad. 事实上,实际地.
计算机专业英语词汇 ... megahertz n 兆赫兹 spontaneously adv 自然地，本能地 incidence n 影响.

list.abs: 自然流产(spontaneous abortion)是指妊娠在28 周前自行终止，胎儿体重＜1000g 者。临床上将流产发生在孕12 周前者称为早期流产…
... 麻痹性贝毒,paralytic shellfish poison, 自发极化,spontaneous polarization, --PspPSP压力敏感涂料,Pressure Sensitive Paint.
自发发射(Spontaneous emission),是在没有任何外界作用下,激发态原子或是分子的电子自发地从高能阶向低能阶跃迁,同时发射出一光子。 hv=E_2-E_1  各原子的.
spontaneous nucleation 自发成核spontaneous radiation 自发辐射spontaneous transition 自发跃迁

entry.def: Spontaneous acts are not planned or arranged, but are done because someone suddenly wants to do them.

example.ex: Diana's house was crowded with happy people whose spontaneous outbursts of song were accompanied by lively music...
example.tran: 戴安娜的家里挤满了兴奋的人们，他们伴着欢快的音乐不由自主地引吭高歌。

example.ex: I joined in the spontaneous applause.
example.tran: 我跟着也自然而然地鼓起掌来。

entry.tran: 自然的，自发的(指由于内部原因而非外界影响所引起的)
entry.def: A spontaneous event happens because of processes within something rather than being caused by things outside it.

example.ex: I had another spontaneous miscarriage at around the 16th to 18th week.
example.tran: 我在大约第 16 至 18 孕周时又经历了一次自然流产。

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes the cord spontaneously untwists before treatment is provided.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sometimes the cord spontaneously untwists before treatment is provided.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes the cord spontaneously untwists before treatment is provided.

auth_sentence.content: They don't just happen spontaneously in a vacuum.
auth_sentence.res_content: They don't just happen spontaneously in a vacuum.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They don't just happen spontaneously in a vacuum.

auth_sentence.content: Bills succeed or spontaneously combust at their very say-so.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bills succeed or spontaneously combust at their very say-so.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bills succeed or spontaneously combust at their very say-so.

means.word_mean: 自然地;自发地;不由自主地

sentences.en: What are the chances of these molecules springing spontaneously into existence?
sentences.cn: 这些分子自然形成的可能性有多大？

sentences.en: Opportunities for learning occur spontaneously every day.
sentences.cn: 学习的机会每天都会自然而然地出现。

sentences.en: We decided spontaneously to board a train for Geneva.
sentences.cn: 我们自行决定搭乘去日内瓦的火车。
